sqlMap.select:
select ID,DEFINITION_ID,ACTIVITY_NAME,TASK_ASS_ID,TASK_ASS_TYPE,ACT_SHOW_NAME,BEFORE_NAME from T_PROCESS_TASK_EXE_CONFIG where definition_id='$definitionId$' and activity_name='$destinationName$'
before_name='$beforeName$'
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT T_PROCESS_TASK_EXE_CONFIG_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS VALUE FROM DUAL
insert into T_PROCESS_TASK_EXE_CONFIG (ID, DEFINITION_ID, ACTIVITY_NAME, TASK_ASS_ID, TASK_ASS_TYPE,ACT_SHOW_NAME,BEFORE_NAME,IS_RECORD_SUBMIT) values (#id:DECIMAL:-9999#, #definitionId:VARCHAR#, #activityName:VARCHAR#, #taskAssId:DECIMAL:-9999#, #taskAssType:VARCHAR#,#actShowName:VARCHAR#,#beforeName:VARCHAR#,#isRecordSubmit:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update T_PROCESS_TASK_EXE_CONFIG set DEFINITION_ID = #definitionId:VARCHAR#, ACTIVITY_NAME = #activityName:VARCHAR#, TASK_ASS_ID = #taskAssId:DECIMAL:-9999#, TASK_ASS_TYPE = #taskAssType:VARCHAR#, BEFORE_NAME = #beforeName:VARCHAR#, ACT_SHOW_NAME = #actShowName:VARCHAR# where ID = #id:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.select: select t.positionid as objId,t.posiname as objName from om_position t where t.positionid='$objId$'
select t.empid as objId,t.empname as objName from om_employee t where t.empid='$objId$'
select t.orgid as objId,t.orgname as objName from om_organization t where t.orgid='$objId$'
select t3.* from t_process_config t1, t_process_task_exe_config t3 where t1.definition_id=t3.definition_id and t3.definition_id = '$definitionId$' and t3.activity_name = '$targetName$'

select t3.* from t_process_config t1, t_process_task_exe_config t3 where t1.definition_id=t3.definition_id and t3.definition_id = '$definitionId$' and t3.activity_name = '$targetName$' and t3.before_name = '$beforeName$'
select t2.empid as empId ,t3.empname as empName from OM_POSITION t1, OM_EMPPOSITION t2 , om_employee t3 where t2.positionid= t1.positionid and t2.empid=t3.empid and t1.positionid='$positionId$'

select t5.empid as empId,t5.empname as empName from om_organization t3,om_emporg t4,om_employee t5,om_empposition t6,om_position t7 where t3.orgid='$orgId$' and t3.orgid=t4.orgid and t4.empid=t5.empid and t5.empid=t6.empid and t7.positionid = t6.positionid and t7.positionid='3'

select t5.empid as empId,t5.empname as empName from om_organization t3,om_emporg t4,om_employee t5,om_empposition t6,om_position t7 where t3.orgid='$orgId$' and t3.orgid=t4.orgid and t4.empid=t5.empid and t5.empid=t6.empid and t7.positionid = t6.positionid and t7.positionid='41'

select t2.empid as empId ,t3.empname as empName from OM_POSITION t1, OM_EMPPOSITION t2 , om_employee t3, om_emporg t4 where t2.positionid= t1.positionid and t2.empid=t3.empid and t1.positionid='$positionId$' and t3.empid=t4.empid and t4.orgid='$orgId$'

with tmp as(select orgid from om_organization a start with orgid =#orgId# connect by PRIOR parentorgid=orgid), tmp1 as(select positionid from om_empposition b where b.empid=#empId#) select t3.empid as empId,t3.empname as empName from t_process_config t1, t_process_config_person t2, om_employee t3 where t1.id=t2.process_config_id and t1.definition_id=#definitionId# and ( t2.RELATION_ID =#empId# or exists (select orgid from tmp where orgid=t2.relation_id) or exists (select positionid from tmp1 where positionid=t2.relation_id) ) and t3.empid=#empId#
select t1.empid as empId,t2.empname as empName from om_emporg t1,om_employee t2,om_empposition t3 where t1.orgid = '$orgId$' and t1.empid=t2.empid and t1.empid=t3.empid

select t2.empid as empId,t3.empname as empName from ac_operatorrole t1,ac_operator t2,om_employee t3 where t1.roleid = '$roleId$' and t1.operatorid= t2.operatorid and t2.empid=t3.empid and t3.orgid='$orgId$'

select t.id,t.definition_id,t.activity_name,t.task_ass_id,t.task_ass_type,t.IS_RECORD_SUBMIT from t_process_task_exe_config t where t.definition_id='$definitionId$' and t.activity_name='$activityName$'
select ID, DEFINITION_ID, ACTIVITY_NAME, TASK_ASS_ID, TASK_ASS_TYPE from T_PROCESS_TASK_EXE_CONFIG where ID = #id:DECIMAL#

select ID, DEFINITION_ID, ACTIVITY_NAME, TASK_ASS_ID, TASK_ASS_TYPE from T_PROCESS_TASK_EXE_CONFIG
order by $orderByClause$

select ID, DEFINITION_ID, ACTIVITY_NAME, TASK_ASS_ID, TASK_ASS_TYPE from T_PROCESS_TASK_EXE_CONFIG where rownum<2
ID = #id:DECIMAL#
DEFINITION_ID = #definitionId:VARCHAR#
ACTIVITY_NAME = #activityName:VARCHAR#
TASK_ASS_ID = #taskAssId:DECIMAL#
TASK_ASS_TYPE = #taskAssType:VARCHAR#

select ID, DEFINITION_ID, ACTIVITY_NAME, TASK_ASS_ID, TASK_ASS_TYPE from T_PROCESS_TASK_EXE_CONFIG
ID = #id:DECIMAL#
DEFINITION_ID = #definitionId:VARCHAR#
ACTIVITY_NAME = #activityName:VARCHAR#
TASK_ASS_ID = #taskAssId:DECIMAL#
TASK_ASS_TYPE = #taskAssType:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.delete:
delete from T_PROCESS_TASK_EXE_CONFIG
ID = #id:DECIMAL#
DEFINITION_ID = #definitionId:VARCHAR#
ACTIVITY_NAME = #activityName:VARCHAR#
TASK_ASS_ID = #taskAssId:DECIMAL#
TASK_ASS_TYPE = #taskAssType:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT T_PROCESS_TASK_EXE_CONFIG_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS VALUE FROM DUAL
insert into T_PROCESS_TASK_EXE_CONFIG (ID, DEFINITION_ID, ACTIVITY_NAME, TASK_ASS_ID, TASK_ASS_TYPE) values (#id:DECIMAL:-9999#, #definitionId:VARCHAR#, #activityName:VARCHAR#, #taskAssId:DECIMAL:-9999#, #taskAssType:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update T_PROCESS_TASK_EXE_CONFIG set DEFINITION_ID = #definitionId:VARCHAR#, ACTIVITY_NAME = #activityName:VARCHAR#, TASK_ASS_ID = #taskAssId:DECIMAL:-9999#, TASK_ASS_TYPE = #taskAssType:VARCHAR# where ID = #id:DECIMAL#

update T_PROCESS_TASK_EXE_CONFIG
DEFINITION_ID = #definitionId:VARCHAR#
ACTIVITY_NAME = #activityName:VARCHAR#
TASK_ASS_ID = #taskAssId:DECIMAL:-9999#
TASK_ASS_TYPE = #taskAssType:VARCHAR#
IS_RECORD_SUBMIT = #isRecordSubmit:VARCHAR#
where ID = #id:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.select: select count(*) from T_PROCESS_TASK_EXE_CONFIG

select count(*) from T_PROCESS_TASK_EXE_CONFIG
ID = #id:DECIMAL#
DEFINITION_ID = #definitionId:VARCHAR#
ACTIVITY_NAME = #activityName:VARCHAR#
TASK_ASS_ID = #taskAssId:DECIMAL#
TASK_ASS_TYPE = #taskAssType:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.update:
update T_PROCESS_TASK_EXE_CONFIG
ID = #record.id:DECIMAL:-9999#
DEFINITION_ID = #record.definitionId:VARCHAR#
ACTIVITY_NAME = #record.activityName:VARCHAR#
TASK_ASS_ID = #record.taskAssId:DECIMAL:-9999#
TASK_ASS_TYPE = #record.taskAssType:VARCHAR#

update T_PROCESS_TASK_EXE_CONFIG set ID = #record.id:DECIMAL:-9999#, DEFINITION_ID = #record.definitionId:VARCHAR#, ACTIVITY_NAME = #record.activityName:VARCHAR#, TASK_ASS_ID = #record.taskAssId:DECIMAL:-9999#, TASK_ASS_TYPE = #record.taskAssType:VARCHAR#

update T_PROCESS_TASK_EXE_CONFIG
ID = #record.id:DECIMAL:-9999#
DEFINITION_ID = #record.definitionId:VARCHAR#
ACTIVITY_NAME = #record.activityName:VARCHAR#
TASK_ASS_ID = #record.taskAssId:DECIMAL:-9999#
TASK_ASS_TYPE = #record.taskAssType:VARCHAR#
ID = #template.id:DECIMAL#

TASK_ASS_TYPE = #template.taskAssType:VARCHAR#
